ai-tha-ap100:1.1_0: “There is no need for the Fortunate One,
ai-tha-ap100:2.1_0: like a pleasing lovely bag with good qualities,
ai-tha-ap100:3.2_0: I gained faith in the sky,
ai-tha-ap100:3.4_0: he rules on so long as he wants.
ai-tha-ap100:4.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap100:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap100:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Universal Monarch.
ai-tha-ap100:8.1_0: the eighth (of dwellings) for the Elder Divinities on Mount Nandaka.
